body:
Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵
svg的路径字符串是要怎么生成？

嗯，我看了下 issue 里提到 clear 方法实际上是调用了setOption({series:[]})，我以为改成setOption({}) 就可以解决，结果发现 setOption 方法好像也不符合期望
```
myChart.setOption({}, true)
console.log(myChart.getOption())  //  打印出来的 option 并不为空
```
我的理解是，`myChart.setOption({}, true)` 会和默认的配置项合并，所以 `myChart.getOption()` 是不会返回空的。我认为应该是 `clear()` 方法里 `myChart.setOption({}, true)` 之后，记录一下清空状态，然后 `getOption` 判断清空后返回 `{}`。 @100pah 是这样吗？
no

> 我的理解是，`myChart.setOption({}, true)` 会和默认的配置项合并，所以 `myChart.getOption()` 是不会返回空的。我认为应该是 `clear()` 方法里 `myChart.setOption({}, true)` 之后，记录一下清空状态，然后 `getOption` 判断清空后返回 `{}`。 @100pah 是这样吗？

验证了一下，好像是这样的

@Ovilia 
It is still an issue that needs a fix if we need animation

Yes, that's exactly the thing we plan to do.
Apparently, there's a large amount of work to be done. So we don't have concrete plans for this.
You are welcomed to discuss about more details about how this should be done.

我觉得，是不是应该修改一下文档。
按照定义来说，getOption 总应该返回当前 option 的状态。
而 option 中实际永远不可能是 “空对象” 的状态。
所以应该把文档中，返回空对象这个说法，去掉？
great！couldn't wait to see this doc feature, if i have some related opinions,i still put them here, thanks
Cannot reproduce this issue in the latest version
Bump? I would be intrested working on this with a few pointers as someone not too familar with the code base

There is no echarts-TypeScript version. Your link points to [type definitions](https://definitelytyped.org/) for echarts. If you install these types with `npm install --save-dev @types/echarts` then you should see `"@types/echarts": "^4.4.1",` (4.4.1 = current version at the moment) in your package.json and you can see the echart-types within the @types folder of the node modules.
If you search the internet for echarts and TypeScript you will get some good starting points (react, angular, vue...).

@ghaefele current version is 4.4.2 now, just update 2 days ago.
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/40984

If you use ECharts in TypeScript project, try this:
```js
npm install typings echarts --global
npm install @types/echarts --save
```
Then import in the files you wish to use ECharts:
```js
import * as echarts from 'echarts';
```
Here's a Chinese blog post about it: http://zhangwenli.com/blog/2017/08/29/echarts-with-ionic/#%E5%9C%A8-typescript-%E4%B8%AD%E5%BC%95%E5%85%A5-echarts

Look like this is a bug related to `TreeNode`, it treats the outer background part as a node too. The example above hide the background node, I create an example that can show this clear: https://codepen.io/dongsuo/pen/NWPbqEQ.
Click the green part which actually shouldn't be a node alert `dataIndex==0`.
I will check this part source code and  try to submit a pr to fix it.

> You can use dataZoom and set a min/max value to y axis.
我的XY轴都是分类轴，固定的值，缩放的是x轴。采用这种方式
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16382880/70964202-ef150600-20c5-11ea-82b5-795e678a577f.png)
实现了图表内部滚动，且不会缩放的效果。但是有其他问题：1、滑动动画不流畅，手机上会有滑动后的减速滑动效果，echart没有，对比就显得echart滑起来一顿一顿的。数据点在滑完后还有个从小到大的慢速放大动画；滑动是还能看到残影。 2、双指缩放手势，虽然不会导致缩放，但依然响应其中一个手指的滑动，会往前滑或后滑。

另外，当xAxis的 boundaryGap: true,时，折线在边缘是截断的
![Snip20191217_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16382880/70964378-9d20b000-20c6-11ea-8dfd-1fcd4df9ef2c.png)
![Snip20191217_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16382880/70964384-a14ccd80-20c6-11ea-9766-cdd232232a56.png)

[这是一个示例](https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xDHD5FFyZ&v=1)

怎么看是有问题？
如果这是一个暂时无法解决的问题，是一个共性问题，那如你所说。但是如果这个很简单，你们能搞定，怎么就和你们没关系了呢，就像你们发布的默认是commonjs版本的一样，发布一个`echarts.module.js`就可以了。现在浏览器进步了，大家用各种构建工具做出来的东西，反而跟不上浏览器的进步？

我也遇到了，这个问题在我这里已经解决。我这边主要影响是我自己的function导致的。在设置option的时候，我们会用到方法，如min、max还有formatter等，如果返回结果不正确就会导致，我这就将min返回成string就出现了改问题。我在解决方案：https://www.cnblogs.com/gzbit-zxx/p/12030974.html

> 一定要保持轴类型是category么
> 由于将x轴类型设置为了数值轴，使y轴的轴线及刻度跟随x轴的零点位置了
> 如果不希望y轴轴线与刻度跟随零点，可设置`yAxis.axisLine.onZero=false`。
> 试一试下面的
> 
> ```
> var option = {
>     xAxis: {
>         type: 'value',
>         
>         scale: true,
>         
>         splitLine: {
>         show: false,
>         },
>         onZero: false
>     },
>     yAxis: [
>         {
>             type: 'value',
>             position: 'right',
>             axisLine: {
>                 onZero: false
>             }
>         }],
>     series: [{
>         data: [[1, 820], [2, 932], [5, 901], [10, 934], [11, 1290], [13, 1330], [20, 1320]],
>         type: 'line'
>     }]
> }
> ```

谢谢🙏，可以了
